values: ....I went to see Aya...hes not at home...he doesnt answer, WHAT the FUCK Aya! Where are you! who are you with dont make Yotan come find you! TALK TO ME! I am seriously bored with this place, so ill take half of your work....to kill some time.

Today Aya forced me out of bed and into nice clothes to attend some wedding cause he said I had to be there cause he was "too sick" to do it...

I don't even know the guy he looked like some gay hairdresser to me, but the bride was little miss Simca the pretty student of mine~ I made friends with the naked bartender Goyjo cause he had smokes, and of a good brand too. I was very lucky.
<Lj-cut text="PRIVATE//very hackable-Cut for Angst">

Seeing the wedding made me think of Asuka...and what could of happened ... I didn't see her in that light so why did I get flashes of her in that wedding dress? I told Schu-baby and Goyjo that I had to see Aya in truth....I needed to be alone I couldn't be there....

</lj-cut>

Anyway now that I'm home I'm tired so I don't think I'll make it to the bar, so I'm just going to bed.
-Kudoh Yohji

<lj-cut text="PRIVATE//Filtered only to Integral">
I'm sorry I didn't directly report to you Ma'am I will by nightfall tomorrow will possibly a written statement, sorry again
-Balinese

This is Kudoh Yohji, teacher of Floral Design. If you got this number at a club and I haven't called you back...Don't worry I will, I am not big on pushy woman so relax baby I'll call. 

If this is a studant, man this is my off time so ask me in class unless its not class related, otherwise everyone else you know what to due.

*kiss noise then electric voice*

Please leave your message after the tone

*beeep*

Wow these trips take  me away the national Florist convention was cool! I wish you could have been there! <3 anyway  students I analogize for leaving you with the curse of Aya-chan for your teacher Yotan is home and he will be taking his classes back! remember your assignment this week is to pick 5 flowers or buy them before class <s>I don't care if you steal them from a Grave Yard</s> bring them to class dead please or dying.

-Yohji Kudoh
<u>Floral Design Students</u>
+ Miwako Sakurada + Simca 
+ Akito Wanajima 
+ Aya Natsume

Last chance to sign up~

I got pulled out of bed for this shit...damn I need to just start going out at night without pleasant company and handle this stuff myself...

damn it...I'm out of smokes...

Hello Cross University! 

This is your sexy professor Yohji Kudoh, I will be teaching Floral Design 1 year round but broke into different terms, this may seem like an easy class but believe me its not so much there is a lot blood sweat and tears that goes into this and your art may be rejected by customers, I have years of experience working in the Koneko no Sumu Ie floral shop in Japan, and have come here to to teach you <s>lovely ladies</s> students.

Sign up now! Class officially started two days ago but what the hell I'll start monday! I got a late start! <3

-Yohji
